title: Lag spikes 6.10+
body: I have been getting random lag spikes for about 5 seconds at a time since patch 6.10, every patch seems to make it just a little worse. it started happened about once a game at most and now its gotten to the point of happening every 45~ seconds to where i can't even play. just wondering if anyone else has the same issue as me or knows how to fix it. this is only happening while i play league no other games or anything else on my computer.

replies.body: A constant connection to the game server is required, otherwise you could experience input delays and lag spikes like this.  Your issue could be due to a network problem suffering from packet loss.  As a first step, I suggest running a[ log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)to get an overview of what's going wrong.  You will also get some troubleshooting instructions specific to your results.  This should help get you fixed up, but let me know if you run into any issues!
